description: Today, the Members of the European Parliament adopted the Media Freedom Act. The rules drawn up are intended to better protect journalists from arbitrary content removal on platforms such as Facebook …
title: Pirates on the European Media Freedom Act: Criticism must not be silenced

description: Today, MEPs shall approve the outcome of the trilogue negotiations on the Artificial Intelligence Act (AI Act), establishing new rules that shall regulate the use of artificial intelligence in the EU …
title: Pirates: AI Act fails to protect citizens’ rights
